Hobart Makers Inc.

Events

Open Night

Open nights are every Tuesday from 6pm - 9pm, and we welcome everyone!

Side-projects Saturday

Side-projects Saturday is a day-time meetup, usually every second Saturday. Double check in the chatroom or check the facebook events list to make sure.

Workshops and one-off events

These are listed on our Facebook events list and our TidyHQ events list
